transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody it's me greg and this is benjamin we're both millers uh we just saw ghostbuster afterlife here in the theater and let me tell you ladies and gentlemen it's good i know you're worried i know a lot of people been wondering what greg miller think of ghostbusters afterlife it gets my approval all right you obviously we're gonna do a full interview tomorrow we'll get the whole team we'll review a rank this is for the free this is just top level i'm not gonna talk about details uh what i will say is like for me personally i thought it opened with a lot of information and a lot of things happening really quickly which gave me a not jump or start anything like that but it was like i had to get my ground legs i had to get going on it right and they tossed so many characters at you so many relationships obviously stuff we know from trailers but it opens in an unexpected way for me uh i appreciate they don't pull plot punches like it gets going and it commits to what it is

you so many relationships obviously stuff we know from trailers but it opens in an unexpected way for me uh i appreciate they don't pull plot punches like it gets going and it commits to what it is really quickly what i really think worked for me was stopping to not thinking of the movie as a ghostbusters movie and thinking of it more as a monster squad movie if you know me greg miller i love horror movies i love ghostbusters obviously i love a movie called monster squad which is a bunch of kids taking on dracula wolf man so so on and so forth this movie draws a lot of lineage from that i think and of course uh then is all about ghostbusters right it is a great ghostbusters story it is a great continuation of the franchise and uh rebirth of it for a brand new generation i'm really excited to see what kids think of this movie what uh young people think of this movie because it is a movie aimed at the youth the youth of america but if you're an old ghostbusters fan like me uh so much to

to see what kids think of this movie what uh young people think of this movie because it is a movie aimed at the youth the youth of america but if you're an old ghostbusters fan like me uh so much to love here so much to love i teared up multiple times i did ball at the end i did i did i did i hit i don't know if you caught it jen i did the inhale i didn't do the full-on ugly saw but it was happening and i was crying a lot uh i can't wait to see ghostbusters afterlife again i can't wait to talk to the guys about it of course we'll be doing that youtube.com kinda funny for ghostbusters in review the fourth episode in the series ghostbusters afterlife so until next time it's been my pleasure to serve you his first movie he saw it he did he saw this he saw this he was wearing a ghostbusters outfit and then he peed on it after the fact so but he was in a jumpsuit no i changed him it was fine it was fine it was fine it was cute
